website_summaries.verdict: This hoe is sturdy and reliable but still lightweight and easy to use.
pros: Lightweight, but still has enough heft to cut into the weeds without much effort
Quick and easy to use on small weeds
Nice balance with sharp corners to dig out tough weeds
cons: Comes with a 60-inch handle, which may prove too long for some users

customer_reviews.title: Sharp steel hoe that will last for years.
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and makes hoeing easier and quicker than the cheaper one I had, well worth the extra money. I love the smaller size and the fact that the edges are sharp all so you can turn it sideways and get between closer plants. Would definitely purchase again, but looks like it will last for many years. Made of steel so it can be sharpened many times.
customer_reviews.author: Gma Jo

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for the garden
customer_reviews.text: We just started using this for our garden this year. Oddly we've been gardening for years but never owned a real garden hoe, I previously just dug weeds up by hand with a small trowel. So far I'm really liking not having to bend/kneel to remove weeds. The blade on this tool is very sharp and slices through the weeds pretty easily. It's very light (but not at the expense of feeling solid) so not hard to manage even for long periods of time in our 1100 sq ft vegetable garden. I like the fact that this product has such a good guarantee, that is unusual now. I hope I never have to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Stipe

customer_reviews.title: Great Item for Close Work
customer_reviews.text: I find this to be a good tool for close work. I first bought the Prohoe Field Hoe and tackled all the heavy lifting. But I found the large head to be too large for getting in close, so I followed up with this one. The stiffness, mass, sharpness and shape of this make this a superior tool. I can work this in close enough to weed right up next to my garden plants. An added benefit is the superior wood handle. It is thick enough to chop with minimal energy wasting vibration. And it makes a good staff for leaning down to pick vegetables or to pull a stray weed if that is called for.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mc2

customer_reviews.title: long handle is good
customer_reviews.text: After three months of solid use I am impressed. The long handle helps by allowing me to hold the hoe at different heights and thus preventing back strain. The metal blade is still sharp and cuts through the weeds in topsoil with ease. Yes it was pricey but I like how it allows me to do an hour of nonstop work in my flower beds. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: discerning customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for narrow garden rows
customer_reviews.text: This single time hoe was exactly what I was looking for. It is great for getting in between my plants and between the plants and the wall. These single tine hoes are hard to find in stores. This seems to be well made and sturdy. I’m oretty sure I’ll be using this hoe for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hoe. We have black soil and are fighting bermuda grass in the garden. This hoe is unstoppable! Love that it has sharp edges on three sides. Great for breaking up ground and the slim design (which at first sight I didn't like) is perfect for getting under plants for precise hoeing. Highly recommend! Worth the extra few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Scenicroutesal

customer_reviews.title: Best Hoe You Can Find
customer_reviews.text: Best hoe I've ever seen. Cutting edge like a sword. Quality product. I'd recommend to anyone who needs a great tool like this over the other ones that are a bit less. You won't ever see one like this anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Everything and more a female would want in a hoe
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this hoe. My Grandmother’s hoe was this size from all the times of sharpening. This one is narrow and lightweight. Very easy to maneuver between plants. Easy to do do what Grandmther called flat hoeing. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Brinson

customer_reviews.title: When i recieved the hoe it was sharpened well, however there were burrs left which were easily removed with a file.
customer_reviews.text: When i received the hoe it was sharpened well, however there were burrs left which were easily removed with a file. After the burrs were removed, i went straight to the garden to put it to the test. it out performed any other hoe i had ever used. It does exactly what its suppose to and seemed very durable. the head is all one solid piece with not weld unlike the cheaper goose neck hoes i have used in the past. I have a big family of gardeners and I am sure they are going to be envious of me with my hoe. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Hagedorn

customer_reviews.title: It’s arrives sharp, hope it stayed that way.
customer_reviews.text: I love small narrow hoes, gets under the weed better, anything you buy always has a big bulky head on them, I normally take them to a welder to have thenm slimmed down and sharpened, this one had all that done. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Searchingforcomrort

customer_reviews.title: The hoe is okay; however, there were a ...
customer_reviews.text: The hoe is okay; however, there were a couple of noted issues.. 1) There were a few runs in the clear coat finish on the handle which could be felt while using the hoe... Once these were sanded flush, then the handle was smooth for use. 2) One side of the long cutting edge appears to have gotten to hot during the sharpening process turning 1/4" of the edge a blued color.. One concern is if the edge gets to hot during the sharpening process, the temper (built-in hardness) of the steel could be ruined.
customer_reviews.author: JERRY A ROGERS

customer_reviews.title: Extremely great tool!
customer_reviews.text: This hoe is very sharp on three sides and easily cuts out weeds and chops through soil. It’s also lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Meh

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Quality, Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Only regret is not purchasing this hoe 20 years ago. Its balance , sharpness, quality of build, and outstanding craftsmanship makes it an actual enjoyment to use. Our soil is clay and very rocky and other hoes struggle. The Rogue simply breezes though the soil with little effort. Will be adding some for friends later on. Thanks for still offering a quality item that will last for many years
customer_reviews.author: Rodney M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality hoe
customer_reviews.text: Great quality hoe! The blade is sharp and keeps an edge so you won't have to hack as hard, and the handle is long enough you won't get a backache leaning over. American made so you can look forward to years of use and you can support Americans working.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Maven

customer_reviews.title: Long handle; sharp head; snake killer
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp hoe with a smaller than usual head. The handle is longer than average garden tools. It does not seem to be overly heavy, but I would not consider it light weight either. I plan to carry this around with me in the garden just in case I come upon a rattlesnake or a moccasin. Then I will probably be very glad to have that long handle and the sharp head too. Very happy that I bought it thought it is a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a good hoe. It is built well and the handle is the length that makes it easy to use. The blades came sharp and ready to use. The blade was not as big in the width and the height as I had doped it to be but is acceptable. The price was or is high but, with the lifetime warranty maybe I can live long enough to get my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Pbrad007

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this hoe
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hoe..... great weight and so easy to use. VERY sharp and makes chore go very quickly. I am 5'3" and husband is 6'2".... either of us can use easily. I highly recommend this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Hoe!!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of hoes before deciding to order this one. I used it yesterday, and it made my weeding so much easier. It is a very good tool. I am so glad that I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Mavis

customer_reviews.title: Rogue Hoe
customer_reviews.text: Weeding in a wheelchair or scooching around in the dirt is a pain. This hoe gives me good reach, while being light and strong. No more trampling my plants while trying to pull weeds. I've tried many different tools for the garden and for me this one works the best.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift for the gardener in your life
customer_reviews.text: Last year we purchased this for our father who is a master gardener. He loves the hoe for weeding and we've heard that our mother was often trying to take is and they were fighting over who got to use it. So, we purchased a second on this year so they both have one.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Travers

customer_reviews.title: Good hoe, but be careful with it.
customer_reviews.text: It's not as rugged as it looks. I broke the head off hammering a dirt clod with it. I bought it about a year and a half ago and have only used it for about 3 months for an hour or two a day.
customer_reviews.author: John Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Weeds tremble when we approach
customer_reviews.text: Good long handle to reach weeds easily and good for taller person. Best part is you can sharpen the blade so you could almost shave with it (not recommended 😳), which effectively slices off weed roots.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small, sharp hoe to use to weed close to perennials as they emerge in the spring. This fits the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence L. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: A Hoe Well Built to Serve Its Purpose
customer_reviews.text: A hearty hoe, well made to serve its purpose. Long handle, sharp edge to hoe. Definitely don't need a second hoe. The garden hoe was as advertised and arrived ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: M. J.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sharp and light weight as promised
customer_reviews.text: Very light considering the length of the wood handle and the heavy duty-ness of the metal hoe/blade. Blade is extremely sharp such that we drag the hoe head in the dirt rather than having to swing down on the weeds, to unearth and cut. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott in HI

customer_reviews.title: Love that it's made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son-in-law for Christmas. Love that it's made in the USA! He'll be putting it to good use once the snow melts and ground thaws. PS - I had a good chuckle at the post office when I announced that I got my son-in-law a hoe for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: laurie.j62

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well so far. I am a ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well so far. I am a big fan of a traditional Warren hoe and thought I would try it. See what happens after it is used for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Robert V. Bethurem

customer_reviews.title: Great Especilly if you are Tall
customer_reviews.text: Being six feet two inches all my muscles said yes to this long handled beauty. Boy is it sharp! It is all I expected, and more. I will be looking for other products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: lowelaw

customer_reviews.title: Just what was wanted
customer_reviews.text: Husband used this type of hoe when he was a teenager walking beans in the fields in central Illinois. He hasn't used it yet but I'm sure it'll work. It;s just what he wanted for our garden to hoe weeds.
customer_reviews.author: SunBronze

customer_reviews.title: Best "Hoe" in the USA;)
customer_reviews.text: This hoe is the BEST one I have ever had!!!! It is AMAZING!! I pulled it out of the package yesterday and put it right to work. This bad boy can do the job and then some! I would definitely keep all appendages away from this sharp blade....MADE IN THE USA!!!! Go USA!
customer_reviews.author: Thea Beth Thorne

customer_reviews.title: If you have a rockery, you need this.
customer_reviews.text: Great shape and sharp blade. It's the only thing I've found that makes light work of the weeds around my riprap here in Arizona. Can break small branches in undergrowth too. This desert rat with a bad back loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Lindborg

customer_reviews.title: Invest in a Quality Garden Hoe
customer_reviews.text: An excellent garden tool. The hoe appears to be exceptionally well made and came with a sharp edge to make quick work of the weeds in my flower and vegetable gardens. It is light too. I hope that it gives me many years of service.
customer_reviews.author: 4thRockShopper

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This thin blade style hoe seems to be fairly rare, but it's my preference for general purpose weeding, and can easily be used to create hills / troughs. Easily maneuverable, great for the gardener who doesn't want a separate tool for each task. Hoe arrived nicely packaged and fairly sharp. Used immediately without further sharpening, so far it has produced good results! Seems to keep an edge well, though I have only used it three times since it arrived. We'll see how long it lasts, I have high hopes. So far, I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Definitely sharp
customer_reviews.text: The hoe has a good "feel" to it, light weight and balanced. Anxious to use it. From all I've heard it will make every gardener's least favorite, weeding, chore, a lot easier, I'm anxious to se how it performs, compared to my goose neck hoe..
customer_reviews.author: dr.dale

customer_reviews.title: Great hoe.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hoe. Arrived on time and carefully packaged. It is very sharp and it is a breeze to walk through my very natural yard and quickly chop out the weeds. Would highly recommend. I love it and use it weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, made in USA, built to outlive me
customer_reviews.text: This is a great solid product, not too heavy, and good for hours of work. It is built very well out of a thick piece of metal with a nicely machined edge on three sides. I have already put a number of hours of use and already sharpened the cutting edge. Edge restores quickly and painlessly. I definitely would recommend this tool to others and will be sure to try other Rogue Hoe products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Zaydel

customer_reviews.title: Innovative design
customer_reviews.text: Great small profile hoe. Sharp, easy to maneuver around shrubs and beds to groom and remove unwanted weeds. Design allows use from side and upright angles.
customer_reviews.author: db2

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: It is super sharp. I did not expect it to be as sharp as it was. It was delivered very quickly and packaged well. I would recommend the seven lights seller as well as the hoe. I hope to own more of these soon and I will definitely look to buy from this seller again. Everything was top notch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Golden

customer_reviews.title: I did like it. It sure beats bending over to weed ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for Christmas. I've only had an opportunity to get in the yard and use it once due to weather conditions. I did like it. It sure beats bending over to weed and it is much faster. I don't think I was getting the root of the weed though. I'm wondering if they will come back quickly in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: T. Klinc

customer_reviews.title: I received it in 2 days which I loved and received an email from the seller cautioning me ...
customer_reviews.text: I researched hoes online before deciding to buy this Rogue hoe. I received it in 2 days which I loved and received an email from the seller cautioning me about the sharpness of the blade to make sure that I would be safe. The hoe is very nice and makes my job easier than when I was using my old dull blade. The wood handle is smooth and appears to be sealed and the blade is black and is substantially nicer than any hoe I have previously owned
customer_reviews.author: ?inabq

customer_reviews.title: Nice how.
customer_reviews.text: Much better than a regular, heavy hoe. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Checkers

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Use it every day. Professional landscsper. I have 2 for the last 5 years...Still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Erich S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great it's just what I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: Works great it's just what I've been looking for. Great design the weeds don't have a chance. I like the small head that is so easy to manage and it's so lite I can actually use it with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: K H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gardening Tool
customer_reviews.text: Any of the Prohoe Rogue garden tools are exceptional and carry a lifetime warranty. As soon as I picked one up I knew I was holding the best in gardening tools. I recommend any Rogue garden tools.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Dented Blade
customer_reviews.text: This hoe works decently but arrived with a dented blade. Its craftsmanship is questionable. The advertisement photos misrepresent the product.
customer_reviews.author: ;-l-

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a great tool for the garden
customer_reviews.text: The Rogue did a wonderful job clearing out weeds. It was easy to manuver between the shrubs & perrenials, light enough to use for several hours, and the sharp blade cut through the upper soil surface lake a hot knive going through butter. I strongly recommend this for a replacement of ordinary garden hoes as well as a long handled weed slicer.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Nut

customer_reviews.title: Best garden hoe EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this garden hoe been all my life???? Easy order - fast shipping with Amazon Prime. Well-packaged - HIGH quality product. The minute I unpacked it, it was put to use in the garden - slicing through the weeds like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Love the Rogue Garden Hoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality tool, with three great edges that allow cultivation of wide or narrow spaces, a big plus for someone with flower beds and tightly planted raised vegetable beds. The heft is just right and the ash handle sturdy. Customer service/backup outreach is another plus.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh H

customer_reviews.title: This is a great hoe. It works well in getting weeds out ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hoe. It works well in getting weeds out of rows. You can turn it sideways and get very close to plant. Extremely sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys W. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Super Hi-Quality Hoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the sturdiest and best hoe that I have ever used. It maintains it's sharp edge and it really digs out the weeds or anything else. Turn it on its side edges and it really digs out the weeds. I would highly recommend it. It is worth every penny that it costs!
customer_reviews.author: DCD

customer_reviews.title: says it super sharp, Great hard material
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this.. says it super sharp, Great hard material, does a marvelous job~
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool for gardening!
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to weed with this hoe. The edge is sharp and slices weeds quickly. I love the quality and workmanship, also!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received Rouge Hoe within two days after order placed . It's got to be the best yard tool I have . I'm sure it will last forever . Great designs and easy to use . Everybody should have one.
customer_reviews.author: RLMo

customer_reviews.title: Love the prohoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the prohoe. Bought one 30 years ago and lost it during a move. It’s kind of a throw back to the days you could buy quality instead of throw away junk
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mulvania

customer_reviews.title: Best hoe I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best hoe I've ever used. Nice balanced weight for easy use. I have 5 acres to hoe and am a 60 year old woman, The weeds are flying every which direction. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy M.

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effect and well made.
customer_reviews.text: This tool arrived ready to work and appears to be well made. It performs better than any other hoe I've used before. It's light, easy to maneuver and sharp, making it more like shaving the weeds than digging them out. The handle is longer than typical, which works for me, but I suppose it could easily be cut to a shorter length that fits the user if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Solid and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This hoe is solid! It was easy to sharpen and held the edge through a tough landscaping project. It works well on the short and long sides. I threw the old cheap ones away.
customer_reviews.author: Windswept Hill Studio

customer_reviews.title: Best hoe ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hoe over not only ever owned but ever used. After using this hoe I decided to give others away. Wish I would have purchased this earlier in life. Sharp and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Linton

customer_reviews.title: Cutting edge
customer_reviews.text: What a concept! a hoe with a cutting edge. Works great for weeding with half the effort of a standard hoe.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R Scherer

customer_reviews.title: Super hoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very sturdy. Very sharp. Just about the toughest garden implement I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a bad to the bone hoe. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam N.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and useful
customer_reviews.text: Hoe works great-nice and sharp for cleaning up perenials, so can't wait to use it again in the Spring. This company has good follow-up and I will shop for more of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Groundhog

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite hoe ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite hoe ever! Cuts through weeds and grass like butter. Please be careful, as this blade is very sharp! I can also turn on its side and get into tight spaces or make a furrow for seeds. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: LauraG

customer_reviews.title: fantastic! money well spent
customer_reviews.text: fantastic! these are worth every penny and will be the only hoes I will buy. built like tanks and a quality I wasn't sure you could find in this country. so glad to have found these tools.
customer_reviews.author: texinstyle

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: Looked all over for a hole like this hole and found it on Amazon great hoe works and cuts ground with ease. Boda
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands down a great tool"
customer_reviews.text: "Apprehensive about the hoe due to the cost but well worth it. The hoe cuts through 1" roots with a couple of chops. Hands down a great tool"
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D Camp

customer_reviews.title: awsome is the worst thing I can say
customer_reviews.text: this thing is a machine in the garden.. buy 2 because your wife will still yours.. and the kids love it as well...
customer_reviews.author: John Fogle

customer_reviews.title: Love it a hoe lot!
customer_reviews.text: This high quality tool changed my approach to garden weeding. I am happy to go out and weed. It is effective and easy to draw through both dry and wet soil. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! Have been using our yard
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Have been using our yard, and thoroughly enjoy using this hoe. A hoe like this isn't available for purchase at any of the garden centers here in San Diego. Glad I have one! I'm probably the only person in our neighborhood with a hoe like this hoe. This hoe has my highest recommendation for anyone searching on Amazon for a very good hoe to use in their yard/garden.
customer_reviews.author: JIMMY P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Garden Hoe
customer_reviews.text: Best hoe I have owned. Sharp and cuts through even heavy weeds. Stays sharp and with the sides of the hoe sharpened give maximum use when weeding.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Like axe sharp
customer_reviews.text: Man these things are built well!!!! It puts the ones at the big box stores to shame. As others have mentioned they are sharp.... Like axe sharp! So be careful with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob D. Coates

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hoe. It is the perfect size and balanced. Most important- it is sharp. So nice to swing the hoe and not have it just bounce off our heavy clay soil in south Texas. Only negative is that I did not buy it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: nbgc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hoe. It's just as the description says...light weight, but tough. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: T.Meier

customer_reviews.title: This hoe is lightweight and narrow which makes it easier ...
customer_reviews.text: This hoe is lightweight and narrow which makes it easier to get close to the plants without being too bulky!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality made hoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hoe for the garden. It is made of quality materials and I love that it is small enough to get in between plants to make weeding easier!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Mom loves this hoe! She says it is sharp and scrapes up weeds and grass with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hoe
customer_reviews.text: Great hoe for precision weeding.. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Christine W Wright

customer_reviews.title: it is a very nice hoe. it will be a great help to ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes I recievied my garden hoe.it is a very nice hoe.it will be a great help to me.
customer_reviews.author: clemmon stewart

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this hoe
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hoe!! It's quite sharp, so be careful! I can weed my entire 30x100 garden in no time and weeds don't grow back so quickly vs pulling or other tools. I highly recommend! Makes weeding fun!

customer_reviews.title: WISH i HAD FOUND THIS YEARS AGO!
customer_reviews.text: got it and I love it. this takes most of the work out of weedinf.just set it on the soil and pull back and watche little weeds die.sharp enough to shave with. I wish I had found this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Dr sam

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Garden Hoe
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that such a garden hoe existed until I ran across your product on the internet. I ordered and I couldn't be happier. My wife has a huge flower / shrub garden and this garden hoe is perfect. It is small to get around plants, sharp, tough, just perfect for our needs! Delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: I'm clearing weeds and overgrown brush at a neglected home I recently purchased and the garden hoe has been an excellent tool to
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and sharp. I'm clearing weeds and overgrown brush at a neglected home I recently purchased and the garden hoe has been an excellent tool to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Northern NJ

customer_reviews.title: I found the hoe to light. Even with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I found the hoe to light. Even with the razor sharpness it takes a lot of hoeing to get through tougher weeds.
customer_reviews.author: Meerkat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great qlty..meets my needs..bermuda dosnot have a chance.. ralph wes sac ca..
customer_reviews.author: ralph

customer_reviews.title: We have not had a chance to use it yet ...
customer_reviews.text: We have not had a chance to use it yet (it was a Christmas gift for my husband), but it is exactly what he wanted! And it arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke M.

customer_reviews.title: happy, happy
customer_reviews.text: excellent hoe....having back and hand issues with severe arthritis, it is not hurting me to hoe like others in the past....goes through Johnson grass/weeds easily. I know I'll be enjoying it for years and will keep near me on our farm....always a great tool for chopping off a snake's head too!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R.

customer_reviews.title: To buy
customer_reviews.text: Robust and sharp, it makes breaking thru difficult terrain quite easy. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: The best hoe I have ever owned period
customer_reviews.text: The best hoe I have ever owned period! I enjoy gardening and was tired of the cheap tools which can be purchased at various chain stores. This home comes sharp out of the box, well built, and tough. Don't buy an imitation, get a Rogue Hoe!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Wanted the 54" handle
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars, however was not given the option of the shorter handle, which I preferred! Hoe itself well made.
customer_reviews.author: shirley jean moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy, lightweight garden hoe arrived very sharp and safely packed. It performs beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One heavy duty rugged hoe. Nothing else like it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing heavy duty tool. Nice people to deal with as well. Good all around. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: JustaGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great hoe - the sharpest I've used
customer_reviews.text: Great hoe - the sharpest I've used. It makes getting rid of weeds in the garden a much easier task. This is a quality made in the USA product. I'm glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Mamrose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This hoe worked great for me. I used the weight of the hoe to do the work.
customer_reviews.author: K. Matlock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and very sharp. Exactly the type of garden hoe I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: This hoe is worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, sharp blade and just perfect for the garden. Thanks for making a quality product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Farmwife68

customer_reviews.title: These are the best hoes out there!  However the wood was not treated when it arrived.  It was raw.  We'll put linseed oil on it.
customer_reviews.text: Great hoes. However, the wood was not treated when it arrived. We'll put linseed oil on it. No problem though!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: I am short so this would be nice with a smaller handle but otherwise works great
customer_reviews.text: I am short so this would be nice with a smaller handle but otherwise works great, small head for the price.
customer_reviews.author: R&S Feeders

customer_reviews.title: Great garden tool!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool, quality all the way! Made in the USA, made to last. Love the three sides to handle different areas.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best Hoe ever!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Cuts right through weeds and grass! If you aren't careful it will cut through your shoe so wear boots! Don't think I will ever wear this one out but would buy another one if I did!
customer_reviews.author: DB 22

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. I'm actually going to buy a larger one too for bigger jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Myron P.

product_meta.title: Rogue Hoe Prohoe 5.75" Disc Heavy Duty Garden Hoe Tool with 60" Long Ash Handle
product_meta.description:
Having a tool that you can depend on to perform reliably is essential. 

Prohoe's 575G Hoe is just such a tool. Each of Prohoe's tools are individually hand crafted right here in the USA. The tool "head" is custom created from recycled agricultural disc blades--a high grade tempered steel that is both strong and has a great ability to hold an edge, so you don't have to waste time sharpening your tools. And sharp they are. All hoes are sharpened on three sides so that you can get the result you want regardless of the angle you use.

Don't just take our word for it though. Check out want some of our satisfied customers have to say about our tools.

- I am 64 years old and having lived on a farm all of my life using all types of field and garden hoes, without a doubt the 575G hoe is the best. I own three. - Carl 
- Rogue is THE Cadillac of all hoes at twice the price. Once you use a Rogue, you will never want to use a goose-neck or eye hoe again. Weeds don't have a chance. - D. Polk 
- I have already purchased one of your 575G and also your Scuffle Hoe. These are without a doubt the BEST garden tools I have ever owned, and I've owned a alot! I'm an avid gardener so I really put them to work. But whether a person gardens little or much, these hoes are worth every penny and then some!! - Margaret We know you will be thrilled with your Rogue Hoe too!

Rogue tools will make your job easier and last a lifetime guaranteed. That is right. We guarantee that you will not need a new head for your lifetime or we will replace it at no cost to you.

So ORDER YOURS TODAY and experience the quality of custom American made hoes that last a lifetime.
feature_bullets: DIRT DIGGING MACHINE - This 5.75 inch wide tempered steel garden hoe packs a wallop, capable of easily busting open new ground or turning over dirt in your rows. All three sides are precision sharpened so is makes easy work for you and in less time.
BALANCED WEIGHT - You will find this hoe easy to use because of the perfect weight balance it has. The 575 is known as the "right size" hoe for both men and women.
HOES BUILT TO LAST A LIFETIME - Your tool head is guaranteed to last for life. No questions asked.
CUTS FROM ANY ANGLE - Unique shape and ultra-sharp sides allow you the ability easily fit between plants to do your digging.
